detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#24-27) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#25)

SafeMath.percent(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#35-39) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_quotient = ((_numerator / denominator) + 5) / 10 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#37)
	-(value * _quotient / 1000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#38)

detectors.description:
DIFI.mint(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#81-89) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#85)

DIFI.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#134-140) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(finalBalance >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#136)

DIFI.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#134-140) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[_to] = add(balances[_to],_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#138)
detectors.markdown:
[DIFI.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L134-L140) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[_to] = add(balances[_to],_amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#L138)

detectors.description:
SafeMath.percent(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#35-39) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _numerator = numerator * 10 ** (precision + 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#36)
	- _quotient = ((_numerator / denominator) + 5) / 10 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#37)
	- (value * _quotient / 1000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#38)

detectors.description:
DIFI.changeAdmin(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#148-150) should emit an event for: 
	- admin = _newAdminAddress (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#149)

DIFI.changeStakePercent(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#122-124) should emit an event for: 
	- stakePer_ = stakePercent (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#123)

DIFI.changeAdmin(address)._newAdminAddress (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#148) lacks a zero-check on :
		- admin = _newAdminAddress (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#149)

DIFI.mint(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#81-89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_totalsupply > (SafeMath.add(_premined,_mined))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#83)
	- require(bool)(mintingTime[_customerAddress] == 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#84)
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DIFI.sol#85)
